content.rendered:
[blank_spacer height=”65px” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [spb_text_block title=”Who we are” pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/3″ el_position=”first”]

Since its foundation in 1980, Sepha Ltd., located near Belfast, United Kingdom has established a global reputation for product innovation and the development of specialized, high quality equipment used in the manufacture and integrity testing of pharmaceutical blister packs, medical device and healthcare products.

The company provides innovative, non-destructive CCIT and leak test solutions, laboratory scale packaging solutions and deblistering machines for recovery of high value product.

Sepha has established a strong global sales, customer service and support network in all major pharmaceutical manufacturing markets and works with the majority of the world’s top pharmaceutical companies. Sepha’s goal is to help their customers to improve quality assurance procedures and to reduce manufacturing costs, enabling them to efficiently meet the stringent regulatory requirements of the industry.

[/spb_text_block] [spb_accordion widget_title=”More about us” width=”1/3″] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Technologies” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
  • Blister packaging machines
  • Non-destructive CCIT and leak detection equipment
  • Automatic, semi-automatic and manual deblistering machines
[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Major Markets Served” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
  • Pharmaceutical
  • Medical Device
  • Healthcare
  • Food & Drink
[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Contact” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
